content: We are providing coffee, bagels, fruit, biscotti, scones twice a day, once in the morning and once in the afternoon. On the first day, coffee is coming after the first talk, so it's BYOC. I personally recommend Vigilante coffee, which is about a 10 minute walk from the conference venue.

For lunch, there are several restaurants in the area. I've included some in this map, along with some other useful place:
https://www.google.com/maps/d/u/0/edit?mid=1QGb5ufN5wk9eF0OOtbzHaFD-kw6oitk&usp=sharing

You can refer to this site to see more accurate info about on-campus places:
https://dining.umd.edu/hours-locations
Some are closed for summer, some are not.
The coffee came early. Come get it!
